abstract: Office of Taiwan's president announces that Taiwan and China have made rare exchange of spies, with China releasing Chu Kung-hsun and Hsu Chang-Kuo to Taiwan, and Taiwan giving Chinese spy Li Zhihao early parole.
lead_paragraph: Two men from Taiwan’s Bureau of Military Intelligence, who were serving 20-year sentences, went free while an imprisoned Chinese spy received early parole.
snippet: Two men from Taiwan’s Bureau of Military Intelligence, who were serving 20-year sentences, went free while an imprisoned Chinese spy received early parole.
